description:
This course shares how I got rid of my books after writing it and getting it published. I've turned my experience into a proven method, to be able to share it with you!

Get all the secrets and discover why some authors are sought after and generate income from their books around the world!This course will be one of your most crucial resources when it comes to selling your book!

This course will show you exactly what what you need to do in order to get rid of your book once it's published by selling as many copies as possible AND discovering additional streams of income you can generate because of your book.

Being a published author can open many doors for you that remained closed before. I'll show you how you can use your book to find additional ways to increase your income. We've seen people double and triple their income after publishing their book!
title: Sales mastery for authors: generating income from your book
